Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes.name: Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes
Memory of a Thousand Lifetimes.fullText:
Deva Racial PowerMemory of a Thousand Lifetimes

The dreamlike memories of your previous lives lend insight to aid you.

Encounter
No Action      Personal

Trigger: You make an attack roll, a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check and dislike the result

Effect: You add 1d6 to the triggering roll.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 8.
